tool_description: A small API showing news about climate from around the world.
name: ClimateChangeNewsData
title: ClimateChangeNewsData

api_list.name: Get Specific Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint requires a specific id for news, these news are also the providers such as nyp, or latimes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechangenewsdata.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechangenewsdata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechangenewsdata.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechangenewsdata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: Gets all the Climate Change news from trusted sources and return it.
